data.comment: The match is underway at Mandemakers Stadion.
Roy Gelmi for Venlo has been booked by Edwin Van de Graaf and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 28, At Mandemakers Stadion, Danny Post has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Finn Stokkers is on target to give Waalwijk a 1-0 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Anas Tahiri.
In the minute 34, Venlo have been given a penalty...
Goal! The away team is awarded a penalty in Waalwijk. Giorgos Giakoumakis converts to level the scoring at 1-1.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Vito Van Crooij heads in to make it 1-2 at Mandemakers Stadion.
Steffen Schafer instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 52, Said Bakari (Waalwijk) gets a yellow card.
Roy Gelmi in Venlo has been yellow-carded a second time by Edwin Van de Graaf and is being sent off.
Waalwijk's Vurnon Anita has been booked in Waalwijk.
In the minute 60, The away team have replaced Jafar Arias with Stan Van Dijck. This is the first substitution made today by Hans De Koning.
Thierry Lutonda is replacing Paul Quasten for the home team.
The home team replace Cyril Ngonge with Lennerd Daneels.
In the minute 69, Ahmed Touba (Waalwijk) has received a yellow card from Edwin Van de Graaf.
Venlo make their second substitution with Guus Hupperts replacing Torino Hunte.
Simon Janssen is on a sub for Evert Linthorst for Venlo.
In the minute 73, Waalwijk make their third substitution with Vitalie Damascan replacing Ola John.
Goal! The home team draw level at 2-2 through Ahmed Touba.
Richard van der Venne with an assist there.
In the minute 87, Goal! The home team take a 3-2 lead through Lennerd Daneels.
Great play from Vitalie Damascan to set up the goal.
Edwin Van de Graaf blows to end the match. The final score is 3-2.
Fred Grim is making the team's fourth substitution at Mandemakers Stadion with Hans Mulder replacing Finn Stokkers.
Hans De Koning (Venlo) is making a fourth substitution, with Zinedine Machach replacing Steffen Schafer.
Zinedine Machach (Venlo) has received a yellow card from Edwin Van de Graaf.
